name: ATB_EDIT_PNTR_OVERRIDES
description: ATB Edit segment pointer overrides table.

columns.name: AUTH_BUNDLE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the auth bundle record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OVR_PNTR_ENTITY_AUTH_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description: Edit Segment - Override Pointer Table - Role

columns.name: OVR_PNTR_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: OVR_PNTR_FACILITY_ID_LOC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue location.

columns.name: OVR_PNTR_DEPARTMENT_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the department record. This is often used in patient correspondence such as reminder letters.

columns.name: OVR_PNTR_VENDOR_ID
columns.description: Edit Segment - Override Pointer Table - VEN

columns.name: OVR_PNTR_S_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Edit Segment - Override Pointer Table - Scope Pointer Type

columns.name: OVR_PNT_USER_ID
columns.description: Edit Segment - Override Pointer Table - Set User

columns.name: OVR_PNT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: OVR_PNTR_SET_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Edit Segment - Override Pointer Table - Set Instant
